dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5461 IH: Special Diabetes Program Reauthorization Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. DeGette (for herself, Mr. Bilirakis, and Mr. Ruiz) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To extend funding for Special Diabetes Programs for Type I diabetes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Special Diabetes Program Reauthorization Act of 2025.

section.header: Extension of Special Diabetes Programs for Type I diabetes
section.text: Section 330B(b)(2) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254c–2(b)(2)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (F), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (G), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: $160,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 through 2030, to remain available until expended.
